news.title: Three children charged with murder of man in Kent
news.summary: Alexander Cashford, 49, was pronounced dead at the scene in Leysdown-on-Sea in Kent, police said.

news.title: Average mortgage rates below 5% for first time since Truss budget
news.summary: Average two-year mortgage rates have fallen to 4.99%, the lowest point since September 2022.

news.title: Police told they can reveal suspects' ethnicity in high-profile cases
news.summary: Police forces will be encouraged to release a suspect's details in a move aimed at combating misinformation.

news.title: Gaza talks to focus on releasing hostages all in one go, Netanyahu hints
news.summary: Mediators say a deal can be pushed through in the weeks before Israel's planned expansion of the war.

news.title: Model with Down's syndrome to make Strictly history
news.summary: She'll be the first star with Down's syndrome to take part in a regular series of the dance show.

news.title: Amber heat health alert remains in place with 33C forecast
news.summary: Wednesday brings a "complex picture" as high temperatures coincide with a yellow warning for thunderstorms in Scotland.

news.title: Survival rates for most deadly cancers making little progress, experts warn
news.summary: Half of people with cancer survive but lack of progress for some forms of disease is worrying experts.

news.title: Welsh Labour politician Hefin David dies aged 47
news.summary: Hefin David had been Member of the Senedd (MS) for Caerphilly since 2016.

news.title: Nuclear-powered AI could make Rolls-Royce UK's most valuable firm, says boss
news.summary: Tufan Erginbilgic says business deals to supply nuclear power for artificial intelligence could boost its fortunes

news.title: I didn't go to uni - now I work as a celebrity photographer
news.summary: The BBC speaks to four young people who say skipping university does not have to mean missing out on success.
